title: On the metal- and bio-catalyzed solvolysis of polyesters and polyurethanes wastes
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, 2,2781-2804
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00233D, Tutorial Review
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Francisco G. Cirujano, Rocio Villa, Rebeca Salas, Miguel Maireles, Nuria Martín, Belén Altava, Pedro Lozano, Eduardo García Verdugo
Catalysis is a crucial tool to efficiently address the recycling and upgrading of polymeric waste within the context of a circular economy, providing affordable and selective methods for waste valorization.
